text: @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/XhhodKXGt8 Please do the same. Get tests to all American citizens so we actually know if we need to self quarantine. If there are not enough tests for every American who gets sick - we can't get back to business for months! Do the right thing. @VP @SpeakerPelosi

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
